title: T-Pose Zombie Bundle
description: Custom mocap 60fps animations on Unreal skeleton; mesh, textures, LODs and material instances.
longDescription:
<h1>Zombies 1</>
Video preview: <a href="http://youtu.be/LVsARjOpl5EE">http://youtu.be/LVsARjOpl5E</>

The first of a series of game-ready Zombies made using AAA best practices. This content package includes 44 custom motion captured animations on the Unreal skeleton; a primary skinned mesh with high-res diffuse, subsurface, normal and specular maps; LODs; and blendshapes to allow for customization and variation. A separate pants mesh is included for more sensitive audiences. 8-way directional movement is blendspace ready, both with and without root motion. Max poly-count is 10,358 triangles with materials for body, eyes, skull, and pants.

<h1>Zombies 2</>
Video: <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SmBLFo7j3RE">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SmBLFo7j3RE</>

The second of a series of game-ready Zombies made using AAA best practices. This content package includes 50 custom motion captured animations on the Unreal skeleton; a primary skinned mesh with high-res diffuse, subsurface, normal and specular maps; LODs; a morph target to open and close the jaw. A separate shirt, hair and intestines meshes to control the level of gore and creation variation. 8-way directional movement animations with and without root motion. Max poly-count is 10,769 triangles with materials for body/intestines, hair and shirt.
technicalDetails:
<h1>Zombies 1</>
35 In-Place Animations
9 Root Motion Animations
44 animations total

**CHARACTERS**
1 Zombie Character

* Triangle counts of character

Zombie1 -
LOD0 = 7882 Tris
LOD1 = 4152 Tris
LOD2 = 1786

TrisPants -
LOD0 = 1206 Tris
LOD1 = 701 Tris
LOD2 = 301 Tris

Skull -
LOD0 = 1270 Tris
LOD1 = 906 Tris
LOD2 = 522 Tris

*Texture Types
Zombie1 - LOD0, LOD1, LOD2 Includes 1Normal Map, 1 Subsurface Map, 1 Specular Map and 1 Diffuse Map
Pants - LOD0, LOD1, LOD2

* Texture Resolutions
Body Diffuse: 4k, 2k and 512
Body Subsurface: 4k, 2k and 512
Body Specular: 4k, 2k, 512
Body Normal: 4k, 2k, 512
Pants Diffuse: 2k, 512
Pants Specular: 2k, 512
Pants Normal: 2k, 512

*Number of Materials
4 Materials

<h1>Zombies 2</>
Motion captured animations of locomotion , attacks, hits, emerge from grave, knock back/left/right, turns, hitting 41 animations.

- 9 root motion animations
- 50 animations total

Intended Platform: All Platforms
